Rosselli Del Turco, R. Cioffi, F. Goria Update to P5 TEI schemas by R. Rosselli Del Turco and E. Magnanti   Powered by EVT - Edition Visualization Technology EVT created by C. Di Pietro, J. Kenny, R. The 1st edition of the Digital Vercelli Book was more of a digital facsimile than a full diplomatic edition, since just a few texts were included to accompany the facing images. The second edition is a complete diplomatic and interpretative edition linked to the original facsimile.

þe fæder wolde . and geteohod hæfde þæt ic for
hælo geþrowian sceolde. Sagaþ oðer
þæt he ure Dryhten æthrine þæs mannes
earan. and he wæs sona æfer þam hal geworden. ða hie
þa Crist oferfangenne hæfdon. þa gebundon hie
hine. and læddon ærest to Annan. wæs se Anna sweor
þæs Caifan þe ðygere wæs bissceop . wæs þæt se ilca
Caifas þe ær æt þære geþeahtunge mid Iudeum wæs
þa hie ymb hine Crist spræcon .and þeahtodon hwæðer
selre wære þe hie hine cwealdon. þe an forleton.
and þus cwædon. þes man wyrceð maran
wurdon and mænigfealdran þonne we æfre ær
. gif we hine forlætaþ þonne cyrreð þis
folc to him and on hine gelyfað. cumaþ Romane and
ure land and ure þeode. þa cwæð Caifas.hwæt la
syndon unwise men forhwan nellaþ ge geþencan. þæt
þis is selre þætte an man for eall folc deaþ þrowige
þonne eall þeod forwyrþe. witgode he þæt
muðe be Cristes þrowunge . sægde soð swa he
nyste for þan þe Cristes þrowunge and his lichalic
deað þam untrywan folce his þæra haligra to
ecum goode gelamp . ða læddon hie hine Crist
in sumnecafertun þa eode Petrus ond þes ilca
Iohannes þe þas drihtenlican þrowonge. sagaþ feorran
æfter him. þa wæs he Iohannes þam bisceope cuð and his
mannu. eode þa eac in þone cafertun . sona æft æfterhim.
þa stod he Petrus þær ute æt þam gate and hine segeatwerd
ne wolde iforlætan· þa eode he eft Iohannes to þam
geatwearde. and gespræc þætte he Petrus inforlete. wæs þæt
an mennen þe þæt geat heold. þa he þa Petrus ineode
þurh  þæt geat. þa cwæð  þæt mennen to him. Numquid. ac ne
eart ðu þysses mannes þegn þe her oferfangen is. þa
onsoc he sona and cwæð. þæt he his ne wære. ða wæs ðær
sum fyr onæled. þa stodon hie þæs bisceopes þegnas
þær æt þam fyre· and wyrmdon hie. wæs þæt
wel  //;\  \col//  þa stod he Petrus æt ðam fyre and
hine wyrmde. þa fregn se bisceop and ahsode  urne
dryhten Crist be his discipulos and be his lare. þa c
he Crist to him. ego palam . hwæt ic openlice
⁊ and
middangeard lærde. and symle þær eower
gesomnung wæs in eowru templu þyder ealle iudas
comon . þonne ic hie ealle lærde. ne ic owiht
spræc. ne min lar owiht diogol wæs. hwæt
me þæs . frin þæs þæs þa men þe min word
and mine lare gehyrdon. efne þæs þa ilcan þe her
ymb utan me standaþ. hie witon hwæt ic hie lærde.
þa he þa Crist þus cwæð. þa sloh þara bisceopes
ðegna sum hine ofer oðer wange þe him þær ætstod.
and him to cwæð. si respondit. To hwan sceald þu la þus
answerigan ussum þam hean bisceope . þa cw cwæþ Crist
to hi. si male locutus su gif ic unteala dyde swa
hit ne sie. find þe gewitnesse. and hit gecyð. gif ic teala
cwæð and soð sægde. hwæt witest ðu me. oððe to hwan
swingest ðu me þa he þa Petrus æt þam fyre stod
swa ic ær sægde and hine wyrmde þa cwæð hiora sum to
him ac neart ðu þyses mannes discipul þa onsoc he
sona swiðe scearpe .and cwæð ne eom ic discipul. ne ic
wæt hwæt ðu mænest ða cwæð. þara bisceopes ðegna
su. wæs þæs mannes cuða and geþofta þe Petrus ær
gewundode and him þæt swiðre eare of asloh. hwæt
onsæcet ðu ðæs ac ne geseah ic þe in þa leactune
mid þinu þinum hlaforde. þa onsoc he Petrus sona eft
þriddan siðe. and mid aðu swor þæt he his ne wære.
and þa sona creow hana æft æfter þa þa gemunde he Petrus.
þæt word þæt Crist him ær to cwæð.  þæt he him sceolde
þriwa wiðsacan ær þam se hana creowe. Þa eode
Petrus ut þanon and weop swiðe sare. Ða sende he
Crist Anna gebundenne to Caifan his mæge þe ðy
geare wæs bysceop. sægð oðer euuangeliste. þæt þær
wæron gesomnode þara sacerda eader men ealle
and ymb þæt spræcon and þeahtodon hu Crist þurh hwylce
lease gewitnesse to deaþe gedeman meahton And hine
þa læddon in þæt gemot beforan hie ealle. and eodon manig
lease gewitan forð and him mæn \i// g alogen þing onsægdon.
Þa aras he se ealdorman man þara sacerda. and cwæð to
Criste. for hwan ne ondsweras ðu þyssu mannum
þe þe þas þing onsecgaþ ða ne andswarode he him
Crist ænige worde. Þa cwæð se ealdorman þara
eft to him ic þe halsige þurh lifigendne
God þæt ðu us gesecge hwæðer ðu sie se gehalgoda sunu
þæs ælmihtigan Godes. Þa cwæð Cristto him. efne swa
ðu cwæde swa hit is. soð is þonne þæt ic eow secge. ðæt nu
hwænne gelipeð. þæt ge geseoð mannes sunu sittendne
on þa swiðran healfe Godfæder in heofonwolcnu. mænde
he hine sylfne mid þa wordu. and he on middangeard
cymeð on domesdæg. ða hie þas word gehyrdon. þa
slat he se ealdorman þara sacerda se bisceop his
sylfes hræg. and cwæð to eallu eallum þam gemote. hwæt we
nu gehyraþ hu he God eow yfolsaþ. hwylc þearf is us
oðerra gewitnessa hwæt we nu æt his sylfes muðe
gehyrdon his yfelsunga. hwæt þinceð eow nu hu we
hine scylen deman . þa cwædon hie ealleReus est
mortis. he is deaþe scyldig. and þa spiwon hie hiora
spatl on his andwlitan. and mid hira handum hine on his
wange slogon. and him mænigfealde bysmernesse dydon.
and hine swungon and heton hine witgan þurh bysmornessa.
and he þæt eall se heofonlica cyning for manncynnes
hælo geþyldelice abær and aræfnode. Þa sægde scs sanctus
Iohannes euangel euangelium þætte hi hine læddon swiðe ær on
morgen to Pilatus domerne þæs gerefan Đa
hie þa Iudeas þæder in to Pilate gangan. for
hira Eastertidum. Wæs  þæt hira þeaw. þæt hie næfre
woldon in þa tid in ænig þæra inna in gangan
þe þe
cynnes men inne wæron þylæs hie þurh  þæt
wæron. þa wiste Pilatus  þæt. þa eode he in
to Iudeum and him to cwæð hwylce synne secaþ ge to
þyssu men for hwan oncu //,\  \n// non ge hine þa cwædon hie
þa Iudeas. Si non peccam .eet esset. male facitor· gif he

nis us alyfed þæt we moten ænigne man [[o]]cwellan
on þas tiid. Sceolde þæt word bion gefylled þæt
he dryhtenDryhten hælend ær sylfa cwæð. þæt Iudeas þa þe
æfter his lichamlicre ggebyrde his agene leode
wæron. þæt hie hine sceoldon hæðenu mannu to
deaðe gesyllan. for þan Pilatus and his þegnas þe
hine ahengon wæron elþeodige men Romanisces
cynnes. for þan Romane wæron þa gita ealle hæðene
ge feala gera æfter þam. þa eode he Pilatus eft in his
domern and het hine urne dryhten Crist to him lædan.
and him to cwæð. tu es rex Iudeorum. gesaga me la eart ðu
Iudea cining. þa cwæð Crist to him cwist ðu þæt þines þances.
þeþe oðre men be me sægdon. Þa cwæð he Pilatus ne  þæt
huru is þæt ic sie Iudeisc mann. ne ic þe synderlice
to wat. ac þine agene leode and hira bisceopas
þe s ynnigne secgaþ. and for þam hider þe //,\  \me//  to cwalme
brohton. þa cwæð he ure hælend Crist nis min rice
hionon of þyssu middangearde. wære hit þonne campudun
mine þegnas. for me þæt ic nære Iudeum seald ac nu his
min rice heonon. men þa leofostan hwæt mænde ure
Dryhten mid þa wordu. þa he cwæð þæt his rice heonon
ne wære of ðyssum middangearde. hwæt we wit on. þætte
ealle ricu æghwæðer ge heofonlico ge eorðlico. ge ealle
gesceafto on his an walde standaþ. ne for þon þæs wyrðe
wæron  þæt ricu nemned sin in þæt gemet þæs ecan rices
for ðan nis nænig to þam rice her on
þæt he deaþ þrowigan ne scile ac þæt eorðlice
rice mid sorgum healdeð þa hwile þe hit hafaþ.
swa her on worulde iss seo sorh. and sio unblis dryhtnes
hælendes and þara haligra for þan þe hie on sorge
and on earfeðnessum þrowigaþ þa hwile þe hie her on
þysse worolde beoð. ac him is hwæðre þæt soþe
n in
gehealden mid urum dryhtne hælendum Christi þæt
him ece and unalogen bið. and hie þæs a to widan feore butan
eallu sorgu brucan moton. þa he þa Crist cwæð. þæt
his rice heonon ne wære of ðyssum middangearde.
þa cwæð Pilatus to him. ergo es tu rex. gesaga me eart
ðu cyning. þa cwæð Crist to him. soð þu segest cining
ic eom. and to þam ic wæs in woruld acenned and to þam cwom
in middangeard þæt ic wolde soðe gewitnesse secgan
for þam ælc þara manna þe soð and riht gelyfeð and ælc
þara þe min word and mine stefne gehyreð se min bið.
þa he þa ure dryhten þus cwæð þa eode he Pilatus
eft ut to þam Iudeum and him to cwæðne mæg ic ænige
synne to þyssum men ongitan. Ic þonne wat þis is
eower þeaw and eower gewuna þæt ic eow sceal in þas eowre
eastertide anum forworhtum me feorh forgifan.
willaþ ge þæt ic eow agife þysne eowerne cy.
and þæt ge him feorh forgifen. wiste he Pilatus genog
geare þætte hie þa Iudeas for æfste anu Crist
hatedon þa cleopedon hie sona. þa Iudeas ealle
ane worde and þus cwædon. ne willaþ we þysne acweac we
willaþ þæt us man agife Barraban. wæs se
haten su sceaþa and forwyrht man. wæs þær
þy siðe on bendum. þa bædon hie þa Iudeas  þæt him
man þone agefe þæt hi moston him feorg forgifan. þa
heht he Pilatus Crist swingan· and hie genamon þa milite
and geworhton þyrnene coronan. and setton on his
to bysmernesse. for þam cyninga þeaw wæs and casera
þæt hie hæfdon oft gyldenne heafodbeag. þa genamon
hie for þan bysmernesse and geworhton þæt tacen of
þornu and setton on his heafod. and hine urne dryhten Crist
ymbsweopon mid reade hrægle yfelice. for þan þæt
wæs casera þeaw and wise þæt hie hæfdon godbbenne
girlan reades godwebbes..þa genamon hie for þan
þa bysmernesse. and gegiredon hine urne dryhten
hælende Crist mid reade hrægle yfellice. and him
to eodon. and him to onhnigon. and hine þurh bysmernesse
gretton and þus cwædon. aue rex Iudeorum. hal wes ðu
Iudea cyning. and hi hine mid hira handu on his wange
slogon. and him mænigfealde bysmernessa ydon. and he
þa þis eall se heofonlica Fæder geðeldelice
⁊ and
for us þrowode and abær. þa eode he Pilatus eft
ut to Iudeum and him to cwæð nu gyt ic hine hate
lædan hider ut beforan eow ealle. þæt ge mægen
geseon þæt ic nænige synne gemetan ne mæg on hi·
þa eode he ure dryhten Crist ut beforan þa Iudeas.
hæfde he þa þyrnenne coronan on his heafde. and
mid þam readan hrægle gegyred wæs· þa cwæð he
pilat Pilatus to Iudeum. Ecce homo. þis is se man he ac
hataþ hine nu ateon swa swa ge willen. þa hie þa hine
gesawon þa cleopodon hie sona ealle ane worde.
and þus cwædon. crucifige crucifige ho hine man
raþe he is deaþe scyldig. þa cwæð he Pilatus to
hi nimaþ ge hine þonne and ahop hine ne mæg ic ænigne
incan on hi metan  þæt ic wite for hwan ic hine yflian
scyle. þa cwædon þa Iudeas We habbaþ æ and æfter ure æ
he sceal deað þrowian. for þan þe he sægde þæt
he wære þæs lifgendan Gides sunu. þa he þa Pilatus
þas word gehyrde þa ondred he him and wæs forht
geworden. and þa eode he eft in þæt domern. and þa heht Crist
to hi and him to cwæð. unde es tu. gesaga me
hwanon eart þu· þa ne geandswarode he him Crist
ure Dryhten ænige worde. þa cwæð he Pilatus for
hwan ne  andswarast þu me. ac ne wast þu  þæt ic hæbbe
mihte þæt ic þe mæg ahon. swa ic hæbbe mihte þæt
ic þe mæg forlætan þa cwæð Crist Dryhten ure
to him. ne hafast ðu ænige mihte wið me. nymþe
þe sie ufan geseald. efne swa he cwæde ne hafast
ðu ænige mihte wið me butan þa þe ic wille þæt
ðu hæbbe wið me. for þa þa sindon gite scyldigran
þa þe me þe sealdon· þa þohte he Pilatus þæt he
scolde urne Dryhten Crist forlætan and him feorh
forgifan. ða þa Iudeas þæt ongeton þa cleopodon hie
and cwædon· gif ðu þysne man forlætest and hine ne hætst
cwellan þonne ne bist þu caseres freond. for þam ælc
þara manna þe hine sylfne to cyninge deð þonne
wiðcwið he caseres wordu. ða he þa Pilatus þas
word gehyrde þæt he nære caseres freond
he hine cwellan hete. þa gesæt he on his
heahsetle. and het him beran wæter. and he þa þwoh
his handa and cwæð to Iudeu witaþ ge nu þæt ic
wille beon þyses mannes blodes unscyldig and his
deaþes. þa cwædon hie þa Iudeas. sanguinis eius
sie his blod ofer us and ofer ure bearn bædon swiðe
unlædlicre bene swa him syþþan eall unlædlic
on becwom. wæs þiseall geworden on hira
. weorðedon hie þa tiid swiðe. þa cwæð he
Pilatus. to Iudeu ecce rex ur uester þis is eower
cyning. ac hu willaþ ge hine ateon þa cwædon
hie ealle tolle tolle crucifige eu. Nim þu hine
nim and hat hine niman and hat hine ahon. þa cwæð
he Pilatus. hwæt ic þonne hate eowerne cyning
ahon. þa cwædon hie Iudeas ne habbaþ we ænigne
cynning butan casere. þa wæs æfter þam wordum
þæt he Pilatus urne dryhten Crist Iudeu agef and sealde
his agene men mid. and heht hine to rode
lædan. and hine ahon. þa namon hie hine and læddon to
pære stowe. þær hie hine eft on ahengon. and he sylfa
bær þa rode sumne dæl þæs weges þe hine man
eft on aheng. þa æfter þam ahengon hie hine on
þam clife. þe hie heton Golgoðða. and twegen sceaðan
him on þa twa healfa. and hine urne Dryhten Crist
on middan ahengon. þa wrat he Pilatus su gewrit
on brede. and þæt het gefæstnian onufan þa Cristes
rode wæs ðus awriten . «ihs Iesus Nazarenus» . þis is hælend
se Nadzarenisca Iudea cyning. wæs hit awriten on
þreo geþeode. þæt wæs on ebrisc. and on crecis. and on lædenisc
and mænige Iudeas þæt gewrit ræddon. for þan sio stow
wæs wel neah Hierusalem þære byrig þe he on
wæs. þa cwædon þa bisceopas to Pilate ne writ
þæt gewrit þæt he sie cyning. ac writ  þæt hs sylfa
cwæde. þæt he wære Iudea rex. þa cwæð he Pilatus  þæt
ic þær wrat. þæt sceal swa awriten bion þa genamon
hie þa milite þa hie Crist urne Dryhten ahangenne
hæfdon  and þa todældon hie his hrægl on feower. ælcu
hiora feowora his dæl. and þa gita wæs his tunuce
untodæled[[d]]. wæs sio tunuce syllice geworht
næs nænig seam on. ac wæs eall on anum awefen. þa
cwædon hie. uton la ne toslitan þa tunecan ac
utan hleotan hwylc ure hie agan scyle and þa
dydon hie swa. sceolde se witedom beon gefylled se
þe ær in þa sealme awriten wæs and awitgod and se
halga gaſt Halga
Gast dihtode of cristes sylfes muðe and þus cwæð:
sunt hie todældon him mine hrægl. and hie ofer
minne gegyrlan tanas sendon and tohluton. wæron
þa milite þæs gerefan men þy þæt dydon. þa stod þær
Cristes hælendes licumlic modor sca sancta Maria. and hire
sweostor mid hire. and Maria Magdalenisce. and his sylfa
þegn scs sanctus Iohannes euangelista se þe þas dryhtenlican
þrowung sagaþ æfter þysse endebyrdnesse efne swa
swa he his [[]]eagu hit oferseah. þa he þa Crist of
þære rode geseah þa his modor þær ætstandan. and his
þone leofan þegn. þa cwæð he Crist to his meder
. þu wif þis is þin sunu· and þu hine þe for sunu
hafa · and þa cwæð he eft to his þam leofan þegne. ecce
mater. þis is þin modor. and þu hie þe for modor hafa.
and he þa Iohannes swa dyde and he hie þa in moderlufan
hæfde· wæs hit middæg þa hie hine on rode hengon. and þa
he on rode ahangen wæs þa geþystrode hit. and efne
fæstlice genihtode ofer eallne middangeard fra
middu dæge oð non. and sio sunne and ealle þa
hira leoht betyndon. and behyddon þæt hie þa
modor geseon ne woldon þæt men her on eorþan wið hira
scyppend fremedon. þa wiste he ure Dryhten Crist  þæt þa
þing gefylled wæron ealle þe be his þrowunge awritene and
wæron. and þæt halige gewrito sceoldon beon gefylled. þa c
he þa gita. sitio and sæde þæt hine þyrste. þa wæs þær su fæt
mid ecede gefylled. þa genamon hie sume spingan and gefyldon
mid ecede and ysopan þa wyrt utan befeoldon and dydon and sum
hreodcynn and ræhton  //,\  \up//  to his muþe sceolde se witedom bion
þe ær in þam sealme ariten and awitod wæs. be
ylcan ðinge  «in siti meo potauerunt me. hie sealdon »
«ecced drincan in minu þurste.»  þa he ða Crist þæs ecedes
onbyrgde þa cwæð he Crist nu syndon gefylled halige
gewrito. þa onhylde he his heafod on oðere eaxle·
and þa þæne gast of þa lichoman onsende. þa noldon hie
þa Iudeas for heora easttertidu þæt þa lic ealne dæg on
þære rode wæren for þam hie þone dæg haligne dydon.
eodon þa forþ to Pilate and bædon hine þæt he hete þara
manna sceancan brecan on ære rode. þæt hie þe ricenur

pages.text: .xvi.
INcipit narrare miracula quefactaque facta fuerant ante aduentum
saluatoris dni domini nri nostri ihuiesu xpicristi;
HER sagað ymb ðas mæran ge wyrdgewyrd þetoþe to þyssum dæge
þætte ælmihtig dryhtenDryhten sylfa þas world gesohte  þurh
unwemme fæmnan onþason þas world acenned wæs to þan þæt he
eall manna cyn fram hellwara wite alysde  to heofona rices
wuldre gefremedegefremede  to þyssum dæge þe dæg is ælmihtiges
dryhtnes gebyrdtid ealne þysne middangeard mid niwan leohte
his tocymes hegefyldehe gefylde And be þysse gewyrde þe we to dægtodæg
fram worulde fruman ealle godesGodes halige sædon hie
þæt on bocu  on halegum leoðu sungon  þeah eð hit ealle sædon
bodedon hwæðre an Godes þæra halgena  þæt
be ðysses dæges weorðuga  swa cwæð  «þis is se dæg þane dryhtenDryhten »
«geworhteutan we blissian  gefeon on him»  For ðan ðe
dæge ealra cyninga cyning  ealra ealra waldend þysne
middangeard for usse lufan gesohte of ðam hean
for ðam þe ða uplican mid þysse eorðlican  mid þysse

þa þære eadegan tide nealæhte þætte dryhtenDryhten lichomlice
wolde wesan geboren swiðe cyneþrimlica tacen hi beforan
samod siðedon ærest geeode to þam þe he on geboren wæs
þæt nænige men mid wæpnum gefeohtan ne meahton ac hraðe
þæs hie mid wæpnum feohtan woldon hiora earmas agaleodon

nihtum ær cristCrist geboren wæs onsprungon þry
wyllas  of þara anra gehwylcum ele fleow fram ærmergen

ær
upeode ðæt se casere ferde mid ealle his
to Bethem þære byrig þe dryhtenDryhten on geboren wæs

mid
gyldene hringe Mitte ðe Augustus se casere þæt
geseah he cigde ofer eall þæt werud  cwæð  «þæt is gesyne þæt »
«þis is hiofona cyninges tacen þe he him beforan onsende »
« ic wat  þæt sio tid nu ætis þæt he us wille on þas world »
« for ðam fram fruman middangeardes sæd wæs »
«toeacan oðru wundrum þa ymb his gebyrd acweden wæron »
«þæt þis wære ytemest þara tacna þe sceoldon wesan gescepen ær »
«þan þe he on þysne middangeard acenned wære us ðonne nu »
«gedafenað þæt we weorðien þone wuldorfæstan cyning se us his tacn »
«swa swiotolice beforan him sende»   þa hraðe he abead þæt
sended wære to stowa gehwylcre þara þe to his rice belumpe
abeodan het ðætte anra gehwylc þara þe on carcern wære
þæt se wære ut forlæten  þa þe on bendum gesette wæron
þæt ða wæron ealle onlysede  þa ðe for hiora manu sceoldon

niht ær morgensteorra upeode Dryhten wæs geboren ON

þæt he wære acweald ane dæge ær þan þe he erodesHerodes se cyning

Marian fotum  hie wæron gelytlode ðæt mitte wæs sæd
Afradisio þam heretogan he þæder cwom mid ealle his
werode  he wæs ingangende on þæt templ  he geseah eal þa
on eorðan licgan he eode Marian þære fæmnan
he gebæd hælendHælend þæt cild  he spræc to eallu his werode  cwæð
þær ðe þis God ne wære nænige þinga ura goda on hyra onsyne
gefeollon  for þan us is þearf  þæt we don swa ura god þy læs his yrre
deaðes frecnes ofer us cume; Æfter þan ða Dryhtnes engel

Hælend þa weox  he wæs gestrangod gaste  mægene  snytero he wæs

worulda woruld hwæt we nu gehyrdon secgan hwylcnehwegu dæl
ymb usses Dryhtnes gebyrd swylce eac ymb þe he on his
worhte Utan we nu eorne tilian þæt we þe selran syn þon þonne we
bysena usses Dryhtnes beforan[[r]] us reccan  rædan
utan we healdan sybbe  lufan betwiohs us þonne
gyldeð us God ece mede æt ussum ende; .II.
BUTAN tweon lar is haligdomes dæl  ealles swiðost
gif hio hyre gymeleste fram adrifeð  ælce gitsunge
afyrreð  þyssa woruldlicra þinga lufan gewanigg   þæt mod to
Godes lufan gehwyrfeð  gedet  þæt hit ealle ða lustfulnesse
þysses weardan lifes onscunað soðlice sio lar mid geswince
hio sceal þa forenemnedan þing forðbringan witodlice
ealle Cristes þa gecorenan þurh geswinc  þurh lare hie

For hwon wene ge  þæt wif swa sioce syn of hyra gecynde ac hit

þære dæghwæmlican andlyfne anre þe he nede
on lyfian sceolde. Gemunde he þæt  Godes  bebod

þara arfæstra dæda sume asecg[[e]]  \a// n. ðe ðes
wer scs sanctus  Martinus   sona in
gedyde, þeah þara godra dæda ma wære
þonne hit ænig man asecgan mæge. and þæt gelamp sume

burh þe  Ambinensis  hatte wæs þæt in midda wintra

þa sæt þær sum þearfa æt ðam burggeate wel neah
ðon and se nacoda bæd him þa for  Gode  hrægles on
ælmessan. þa ferdon hie ealle forð be him and heora
nænig to him gecyrran nolde ne him ænige are gedon
woldon. þa ongeat he se  Godes  man þæt drihten him
þone þearfendan man geheold þæt he him miltsian
sceolde þe þara oðera manna. nan him arian
ne wolde. nyste þa hwæðre hwæt he him don sceolde
for þan þe he nowiht elles hæfde butan his anfealdne
gerelan ac eall þæt he má hæfde eallll he þæt ær
in gelic weorc ateah and for Gode sealde.
þa his seax and genam his sciccels þone his lodan
þe he him on hæfde snað þa þone in tú and þa healfne
þam þearfan sealde and mid healfe hine eft besweop
þa wæron manige men þe þæt gesawon þæt hie hine

habban.   and þa wæs in þære æfter fylgendu æfterfylgendum niht
ða þes eadiga wer slepte and þa geseah he  Crist  sylfne

þearfan sealde and þa geseah he mycle engla weorod
ymbe þane dryhten standende and þa gehyrde hine
drshten eac mid switolre stefne to englum
Martinus  nu iu he cwæð þus gecristnod ær his
fulwihte he mid þysse hrægle me gegyrede. wæs in
þære dæde sweotol ðæt ure dryhten is swiðe
gemyndig þæs cwides þe he sylfa ær cwæð.  « swa »
«hwæt swa ge hwylcum earmum men to gode gedoþ. for »
«minum naman efne ge þæt me sylfu sylfum> doð.»  he ða wolde
þone cwide gefyllan in þære godan dæde and hine sylfne

ætywan ðam eadigan were sce sancte  Martine .    and
ða se eadiga wer scs sanctus  Martinus  ða gesyhðe geseah
þa ne wæs he hwæðre oht ofor þan in oferhygd
ahafen ne in mennisce wuldore ac he  Godes  gód.
in þære ðære dæde he ongeat. ða he ða hæfde
wint wintra. ða gefullade hine man æfter cirican
endebyrdnesse. wæs he ær beforan þa þreo gear
gecristnod swa ic ær sægde. Ða forlet he ealne
þone woruldfolgoð án to sce sancte  Ilario  þam bisceope.
þe in  Pictavensis  þære byrig wæs bisceop. wæs þæt
swiðe foremære man se bisceop. and his god wæs
swiðe gecyðed. and he þa þysne eadigan wer sce sancte
fulfremedlice in  Godes ǽ and inGodes þeowdome
gety and gelærde. and eac þan þe ðæt eaðdæde wæs.
þa hine  God  sylfa. swa innan manode. wæs he swiðe
geþungenon his þeawu þeawum and gestæððig on his wordu wordum
and hluttor and ærfæst and clæne on his life and gemetfæst.
and milheort on his dædum and geornful and bíwyrde
in dryhtnes lare and on eallum þingum for Gode
fulfremed.   and þa gelamp æfter þan  þæt þes eadiga wer
scs sanctus  Martinus  sum mynster him getimbrade. and he on
ðam manigra  Godes  þeowa gastlice fæder ge wearð gewearð.
and þa gelamp sume siðe þæt þær cw \o// m sum gecristnod
man to him. þæt he wolde mid his lare. and mid his
bysenum beon ontimbred and þa he ða þær wæs wel

feferadle. and þa gelamp in ða tid. þæt he scs sanctus
wæs in sumre fore ealle dogor þa he ða
eft ham cwom þa mette he þone man forðferedne
þe þær untrum wæs and hi ne efne swa færlice deað

Martinus  þæt geseah þæt þa oðre broðor ealle swa
unrote leton ymbe þæt lic. and hie utan stodon þa weop

þæt he swa ungefullad forðferan sceolde. Getreowde
hine ða hwæðre on þone ælmihtigan  Gode  mid ealle
mode and on hi mildheortnesse. eode he ða hwæðre in
þæt hus þær se lichama inne læg. and het þa oðre een

wæs ða ongeat he þæt þær wæs godcund mægn
. and he þara dryhtnes mildheortnesse

. oððe fullice þær msnster getimbrade. and þæt

weorð and mære wæs. þa stod þær su sum nyttwyrðe hus
bi ðam hæðengilde þe he þær bærnan ongan. þa slog
se wind þone lig on þæt nyttwyrðe hus. and him þuhte
þæt hit eall forbærnan sceolde. þa he ða scs sanctus
þæt geseah þa arn he sona up on þæt hus
and gestod he ongen þam winde and efne swa swa se wind

anum þe he ðær bærnan ongan.   swylce gelamp
oðer wundor þyssu þyssum onlic. he cwom to sumu sumum tune þe libras
wæs haten. þa wæs þær su sum diofolgild þe ða hæðenan
men godgild heton and hie hine swiðe weorðedon. da
wolde scs sanctus Martinus ælce þinge þæt gild tobrecan
and gefyllan. þa wiðstodon him þa hæðenan men. and hie
hine mid teonum aweg adrifon. ða eode he
bií in sume stowe and he hine gegyrede mid
hærene hrægle swiðe hearde and swiðe unwynsome
and fæste þry dagas and bæd Gode ælmihtigne þæt he
þurh his godcunde miht þæt deofolgild tobræce
and gefylde þa he hit for manna teonu teonum gebrecan
ne moste. and þa cwomon þær semninga twegen englas.
to him gescildode ge sweordode and mid heregeatwum
gegyrede efne swa hie to campe feran sceoldon
and cwædon þæt hie God sylfa to him sende þæt hie
þæt hæðene werod geflyman and him Martine
gefultumian þæt hie þæt diofulgild gebræce

. þa eodon hie eft to þam tune and þæt deofulgild
tobræcon and gefyldon áá oð grund. and þa hæðenan m men.

mægene to þæs swiðe gefyrhte þæt heora nænig

ealle to dryhtnes geleafan gecyrdon. and hie swa

menio to him þæra hæðenra manna and ealle

and hatheortra þonne þa oðre wæron. and se ða
gebrægd his sweorde and mynte hine slean. þa he
scs sanctus Martinus þæt geseah þa dyde he sona þæt
hrægel of his sweoran and leat forð to þam men
þe hine slean mynte. ða he ða se hæðena man
upp rihte mid //,\  \his//  handa and hine //,\  \sclean//  sceolde. þa feoll he
færinga on bæcling and nahte he his lichoman
ac he wæs mid godcunde egesan swiðe geþread
and he þa him þone eadigan wer sce sancte Martine
bæd.   swylce wæs eft eac oðer wundor
þyssum onlic. and þæt gelamp sume siðe þær he
sum deofulgild bræc and fy. þa brægd þara
manna sum his seax þa se hæðena man hine
stingan wolde þa nyste he færinga hwær þæt seax
cwom þæt he ær on handa hæfde. Gelomlice þæt þon þonne
wæs þær he ða idlan gild bræc and him þa hæðenan
men wiþerwearde wæron þæt he þurh his lare
and þurh dryhtnes gife heora heortan to Godes
gecyrde þæt hie eac sylfe mid heora
þa idlan gild bræcon and fyldon. and he to þæs
wæs þæt he ælce untrumnesse to hælanne
and to þæs mycle gife and ðæs æt Gode onfeng. þætte
ne wæs ænig man to þæs untrum þe hine gesohte
þæt he sona hælo \ne//  onfenge. Ge  þæt oft gelamp
þonne hwylc man his hrægles dæl to untrumum
menn brohte þæt he þonne. þurh þæt wearð
hal geworden. in þyssum he þonne wæs. ealles swiðost
to herigenne, þæt he næfre nænigu nænigum woruldricum
men ne cyninge sylfum þurh lease olihtunge
swiðor onbugan wolde þonne hit riht wære.
ac he á in eallu eallum sóð and riht dón wolde. þis is
soðlice eadig wer ne wæs næfre facen ne inwit
in his heortan. ne ænigne unrihtlice demde
nene witnode. ne he ænigu ænigum yfel mid yfele geald.
ne hine ænig man ne gramheortne
ne geseah ac he wæs in anu anum mode and efne
blisse and gefean. . meahte á in his mode
geseon and on his andwlitan ongitan. and ne gehyrde
ænig man aht elles of his muðe butan Cristes
lof and nytte spræce ne aht elles on his heortan
butan arfæstnesse and mildheortnesse. and sybbe.
and eaðmodnesse.   swylce eac þes eadiga wer scs sanctus.
Martinus mycle ær beforan þe he þone dæg
wisse his forðsiðe and him dryhten gecyðed. hæfde
and he þa his broðru broðrum sægde. þæt hit þá ætrihte
wære þæt he of þisse worulde sceolde ða wiste
he sumne hired on his bisceopscire. þa þe
ungeþweare and ungesybsume him betweonum
wæron. þa ferde he þyder mid his þegnu þegnum. þeah ðe
he wiste þæt hit þa æt his deaðdæge wære. þæt
he huru wolde þæt hie ealle in sybbe wæron.
ær he of worulde ferde þa cwomon hie
to to
ea. þa gesawon hie wel feala þara
fugela þe we scealfras nemnaþ and hie ða fixas
uptugon of þære ea and þeah þe heora hwylc þone
fisc forswulge þonne wæs he eft swa gifre swa
he ær wæs. þæt he oðerne gename. þa cwæð scs sanctus
Martinus hwæt þas wiht habbað deofla
swa [[þ]]þe deofol á sætaþ hwærhechwær he mæge
men beswican. and he næfre to þæs feala
. þæt he æfre ful sie. ða bebead scs sanctus
þam fugelu fugelum þæt hie þanon fra þam wætere
gewiten and on westen and  land sohton and efne
on þa gelicnesse swa he þone deoful of stowa
geflymde þær he þonne wæs. swa ða
sona ealle etsomne on weg gewiton  þæt
nan ætstod furðun behindan and hie þæt
þe þæt gesawon and his fera wæron þæt
ða fugelas sylfe eac sce sancte Martine gehyrdon.
ða he he hæfde þone hyred gesybbodne þe he
þær to ferde and þær well manige dagas wæs and þa he ða
eft mynte mid his þegnum to his mynstre feran
þa wearð he færinga swiðe mettrum þa het he ealle
his þegnas him to and he him sægde þæt he forðferan
sceolde þa weopon hie ealle sona and sarlice gebærdon
for heora hlaforde and hie þus cwædon to him for
hwan forlætest ðu la fæder us nu git. oððe

ðu us eac gif ðu gewitest. cumaþ rixiende

witan þæt þæt is þines modes willa þæt ðu mote
þas woruld forlætan and Crist geseon. ac miltsa
ðu þonne hwæðre us and gemyne ure þearfe.   ða
he ða heora spræce þyllice gehyrde. and he hie ealle

wæs swiðe onstyred mid heora wordum and mid heora

efne mid stefne þus to dryhtne cwæð.
min dryhten God ælmihtig gif ic nu gyt sie þinu þinum

þonne ne wiðsæce ic þam gewinne þæt ic nu gy mid

fram Cristes onsine wære þæt he ða ne gesawe

pages.text: 01 Huru ðæs behofað hæleða æghwylc 02 þæt he his
sawle sið sið sylfa geþence 03 .hu þæt bið deoplic þon þonne
se deað cymeð 04 asyndreð þa sybbe þe ær samod wæron
05 lic ond sawle lang bið syððan 06 þæt se gast nimeð æt gode
sylfum 07 swa wite swa wuldor swa him on worulde ær
08 efne þæt eorðfæt ær geworhte. 09 Sceal se gast cuman
geohðum hremig 10 symble ymbe seofon niht sawle findan
11 þone lichoman þe hie ær lange wæg 12 þreo hund wintra
butan ær þeodcyning 13 ælmihtig God ende worulde 14
wille weoruda dryhten. 15 Cleopað þon þonne swa cearful
cealdan reorde 16 spreceð grimlice se gast to þam duste:
17 Hwæt druh ðu dreorega to hwan drehtest ðu me 18 eorðan
fulnes eal forwisnad 19 lames gelicnes lyt ðu gemundest
20 to hwan þinre sawle þing siðþan wurde 21 syððan
oflichoman of
læded wære! 22 Hwæt wite ðuðu me weriga hwæt
ðu huru wyrma gyfl 23 lyt geþohtest þa ðu lustgryrum
eallu 24 ful geodest hu ðu on eorðan scealt 25 wyrmum to
wiste! Hwæt ðu on worulde ær 26 lyt geþohtest hu þis is
þus lang hider 27 Hwæt þe la engel ufan of roderum 28 sawle
onsende þurh his sylfes hand 29 meotod ælmihtig of
his mægenþrymme. 30 ond þe gebohte blode þy halgan . ond
31 þu me mid þy heardan hungre gebunde 32 ond gehæftnedest
helle witum. 33 Eardode ic þe on innan ne meahte ic ðe
of cuman 34 flæsce befangen ond me fyrenlustas 35 þine
þæt me þuhte ful oft 36 þæt hit wær xxx
þusend wintra 37 to þinum deaðdæge a ic uncres
onbad 38 earfoðlice nis nu huru se ende to God.
39 wære þu þe wiste wlanc .ond wines sæd. 40 þrymful
ond ofþyrsted wæs 41 godes lichoman gastes drynces.
42 forðan þu ne hogodest her on life 43 syððan ic ðe on
worulde wunian sceolde 44 þæt ðu wære þurh flæsc
ond þurh fyrenlustas 45 strange gestryned ond gestaðolod
þurh me, 46 ond ic wæs gast on ðe fram gode sended 47 næfre
ðu me wið swa heardu helle witum 48 ne generedest
þurh þinra meda lust. 49 scealt ðu minra gesynta
sceame þrowian 50 on ðam myclan dæge þonne eall
manna cynn 51 se ancenneda ealle gesamnað 52 ne eart
ðu þon leofra nænigu lifigendra 53 men to gemæccan.
ne meder ne fæder 54 ne nænigum gesybban. þonne se
swearta hrefen 55 syððan ic ana of ðe ut siðode 56 þurh
þæs sylfes hand þe ic ær onsended wæs. 57 ne mæg þe nu
heonon adon hyrsta þy readan. 58 ne gold ne seolfor
ne þinra goda nan 59 ne þinre bryde beag ne þin
goldwela. 60 ne nan þara goda þe ðu iu ahtest 61 ac her
sceolon onbidan ban bereafod 62 besliten synum ond þe
þin sawl sceal 63 [[]] minum unwillu oft gesecan
64 wemman þe mid wordu swa ðu worhtest to me. 65 eart ðu nu dumb
ond deaf ne synt þine dreamas awiht 66 sceal ic ðe nihtes
swa þeah nede gesecan 67 synnum gesargod ond eft sona
fram þe 68 hweorfan on hancred þonne halige men 69
gode lofsang doð 70 secan þa hamas þe ðu me
her scrife . 71 ond þa arleasan eardungstowe . 72 ond þe sculon
her moldwyrmas manige ceowan 73 slitan sarlice
wihta 74 gifre ond grædige ne synt þine æhta awihte.
75 þe ðu her on moldan mannu eowdest. 76 Forðan þe wære
selre swiðe mycle 77 þon þonne þe wæron ealle eorðan speda. 78
butan þu hie gedælde dryhtne sylfum 79 þær ðu wurde æt frymðe
fugel oððe fisc on sæ 80 oððe on eorðan neat ætes tilode
81 feldgangende feoh butan snyttro 82 oððe on westenne
wilddeora 83 þæt wyrreste þær swa God wolde . 84 ge þeah
ðu wære wyrmcynna 85  þæt grimmeste þær swa God wolde.
86 þonne ðu æfre on moldan man gewurde. 87 oððe æfre
fulwihte onfon sceolde. 88 Þonne ðu for unc bæm
andwyrdan scealt 89 on ðam miclan dæge þonne mannu
beoð 90 wunda onwrigene þa ðe on worulde ær 91
fyren fulle fyrenful
le men fyrn geworhton 92 ðon ðonne wyle dryhten sylf dæda
gehyran 93 hæleða gehwylces heofena scippend 94 æt ealra
manna gehwæs muðes reorde 95 wunde wiðerlean. Ac
hwæt wylt ðu þær 96 on þam domdæge dryhtne secgan. 97 þonne
ne bið nan na to þæs lytel lið on lime aweaxen. 98 þæt ðu ne
scyle for anra gehwylcum onsundru 99 riht agildan.
þon þonne reðe bið 100 dryhten æt þam dome ac hwæt do wyt unc.
101 sculon wit þon þonne eft ætsomne siððan brucan 102 swylcra
swa ðu unc her ær scrife. 103 fyrnað þus þæt flæschord
sceall þon þonne feran [[w]]onweg. 104 secan hellegrund nallæs
heofondreamas 105 dædum gedrefed ligeð dust þær hit
wæs . 106 ne mæg him ondsware ænige gehatan 107 geomrum gaste
geoce oððe frofre . 108 bið þæt heafod tohliden handa
109 geaglas toginene goman toslitene 110 sina beoð
asocene swyra becowen 111 fingras tohrorene 112 rib
reðe wyrmas 113 beoð hira tungan totogenne on tyn
healfa 114 hungregu to frofre forþan hie ne magon
huxlicum 115 wordum wrixlian wið þone werian gast .
116 gifer hatte se wyrm þe þa eaglas beoð 117 nædle
. Se genydde to 118 me ærest eallra on þam eorðscræfe
119 þæt he þa tungan totyhð ond þa teð þurhsmyhð . 120 ond þa eagan
þur heteðufan on þæt heafod . 121 ond to ætwelan oðrum gerymeð.
122 wyrmum to wiste þonne þæt werie 123 lic acolod bið. þæt
lange ær 124 werede mid wædum bið þon þonne wyrma gifel 125 on
eorþan þæt mæg æghwylcum 126 men to gemynde modsnotra
gehwam.
127 Ðonne bið hyhtlicre þæt sio halige sawl 128 færeð to ðam
flæsce frofre bewunden 129 bið þæt ærende eadiglicre
130 funden on ferhðe mid gefean seceð 131 lustum þæt lamfæt
þæt hie ær lange wæg 132 þon þonne þa gastas gode word sprecað
133 snottre sigefæste ond þus soðlice 134 þone lichoman lustum
gretaþ 135 wine leofesta ah ðe wyrmas gyt 136 gifre gretaþ
nu is þin gast cumen 137 fægere gefrætewod of mines
fæder rice 138 earum bewunden eala min dryhten 139 þær ic
þe moste mid me lædan 140 þæt wyt englas ealle gesawon
141 heofona wuldor swylc swa ðu me ær her scrife 142 fæstest
ðu on foldan ond gefyldest me 143 godes lichoman gastes
drynces 144 wære ðu on wædle sealdest me wilna geniht
145 forðan ðu ne þearft sceamian þon þonne sceadene beoþ 146 þa
synfullan ond þa soðfæstan 147 on þam mæran dæge þæs ðu
me geafe 148 ne ðe hreowan þearf her on life 149 ealles swa
mycles swa ðu me sealdest 150 on gemotstede manna
ond engla 151 bygdest ðu þe for hæleðum ond ahofe [[me]] me on
ecne dream. 152 Forþan me a langaþ leofost manna 153 on
minum hige hearde þæs þe ic þe on þyssum hynðu hynðum wat
154 wyrmu wyrmum to wiste ac þæt wolde god. 155 þæt þu æfre þus laðlic
legerbed cure. 156 Wolde ic þe ðonne secgan þæt ðu ne sorgode
157 forðan wyt bioð gegæderode æt godes dome 158 moton wyt
þonne ætsomne syþan brucan 159 ond unc on heofonum
beon. 160 ne þurfon wyt beon cearie æt cyme
dryhtnes. 161 ne þære andsware yfele habban 162 sorge
in hreðre. ac wyt sylfe magon 163 æt ðam dome þær .
dædum agilpan. 164 hwylce earnunga uncre wæron. 165 Wat
ic þæt þu wære on woruldrice 166 geþungen þrymlice þysses

pages.text: 01 sorh cymeð 02 manig.  mislic. in manna drea. 03 eorl oðerne
mid æfþancu 04  mid teonwordu tæleð behindan 05 spreceð
fægere beforan  þæt facen þeah 06 hafað in his
hord unclæne 07 byð þonne þæs wommes gewita weorulda
Dryhten; 08 Forðan se witiga cwæð 09 ne syle ðu me ætsomne
mid þam synfullu 10 in wita forwyrd. weoruda Dryhten. 11 ne
me on life forleos mid þam ligewyrhtum 12 þam þe ful smeðe
spræce habbað 13  in gastcofan grimme geþohtas. 14 gehatað
holdlice swa hyra hyht ne gæð 15 wære mid welerum wea bið
in mode 16 siofa synnu fah sare geblonden 17 gefylled mid
facne þeah he fæger word 18 utan ætywe ænlice beoð 19 swa ða
beon berað buta ætsomne 20 arlicne anleofan  ætterne
tægl. 21 hafað on hindan hunig on muðe 22 wynsume wist hwilu
wundiaþ 23 sare mid stinge. þonne se sæl cymeð. 24 swa bioð gelice þa
leasan me 25 þa ðe mid tungan treowa gehataþ 26 fægerum
facenlice þencaþ 27 þonne hie æt nehstan nearwe
28 hafað on gehatum hunigsmæccas 29 smeðne
in siofan innan 30 þurh deofles cræft dyrne wunde.
31 swa is nu þes middangeard mane geblonden 32 wanað  weaxeð
wacað se ealda 33 dweleð  drefeð dæges  nihtes 34 miltse mid mane
mægene getryweð 35 ehteð æfestra inwit saweð 36 nið mid
nænig oðerne 37 freoð in fyrhðe nimþe feara hwylc
38 þæt he soðlice sybbe healde 39 gastlice lufe swa him God
bebead 40 forþan eallunga hyht geceoseð 41 woruld
. se ðe wis ne bið 42 snottor searocræftig s
rædes 43 uton to þam beteran nu we bot cunnon 44 hycgan  hyhtan
þæt we heofones leoht 45 uppe mid englum agan moton
46 gastum to geoce þonne God wile 47 eorðan lifes ende

pages.text: 01 HWæt ic swefna cyst secgan wylle 02 hæt me gemætte
to midre nihte 03 syðþan reordberend reste wunedon.
04 þuhte me þæt ic gesawe syllicre treow 05 on lyft
lædan leohte bewunden 06 beama beorhtost eall þæt
beacen wæs 07 begoten mid golde gimmas stodon 08 fægere
æt foldan sceatum . swylce þær fife wæron 09 uppe
on þam eaxlegespanne beheoldon þær engel
ealle 10 fægere þurh forðgesceaft ne wæs ðær huru
fracodes gealga . 11 ac hine þær beheoldon halige gastas
12 men ofer moldan and eall þeos mære gesceaft .
13 Syllic wæs se sigebeam and ic synnu synnum fah 14 forwunded
mid wommu wommum geseah ic wuldres treow. 15 wædum
wynnu wynnum scinan 16 gegyred mid golde gimmas hæfdon
17 bewrigene weorðlice wealdes treow . 18 hwæðre ic
þurh þæt gold ongytan meahte 19 earmra ærgewin
þæt hit ærest ongan 20 swætan on þa swiðran healfe
eall ic wæs mid surgum gedrefed . 21 Forht ic wæs for
þære fægran gesyhðe geseah ic þæt fuse beacen.
22 wendan wædum and bleom hwilum hit wæs mid wætan bestemed. 23 beswyled
mid swates gange . hwilum mid since gegyrwed . 24 hwæðre ic þær
licgende lange hwile. 25 beheold hreowcearig . hælendes treow.
26 oððæt ic gehyrde þæt hit hleoðrode 27 ongan þa word sprecan
wudu selesta 28 þæt wæs geara iu . ic þæt gyta geman . 29 þæt ic wæs
aheawen holtes on ende 30 astyred of stefne minu minum .genaman
me ðær strange feondas 31 geworhton him þær to wæfersyne
heton me heora wergas hebban . 32 bæron me ðær beornas
on eaxlum oððæt hie me on beorg asetton 33 gefæstnodon me
þær feondas genoge . geseah ic þa frean mancynnes 34 efstan
elne mycle þæt he me wolde on gestigan . 35 þær ic þa ne dorste
ofer dryhtnes word 36 bugan oððe berstan .þa ic bifian geseah
37 eorðan sceatas ealle ic mihte 38 feondas gefyllan hwæðre
ic fæste stod. 39 Ongyrede hine þa geong hæleð þæt wæs  God
ælmihtig 40 strang and stiðmod gestah he on gealgan heanne
41 modig on manigra gesyhðe. þa he wolde mancyn lysan .
42 ifode ic þa me se beorn ymbclypte . ne dorste ic hwæðre
bugan to eorðan 43 feallan to foldan sceatu sceatum . ac ic sceolde fæste
standan. 44 Rod wæs ic aræred . ahof ic ricne cyning 45 heofona
hlaford. hyldan me ne dorste . 46 þurhdrifan hi me mid
deorcan næglu næglum . on me syndon þa dolg gesiene 47 opene
ne dorste ic hira nænigu nænigum sceððan 48 bysmeredon hie
unc butu ætgædere eall ic wæs mid blode bestemed 49 .begoten of
þæs guman sidan siððan he hæfde his gast onsended. 50 feala
ic on þam beorge gebiden hæbbe 51 wraðra wyrda . geseah ic weruda
God 52 þearle þenian þystro hæfdon 53 bewrigen mid wolcnum
wealdendes hræw. 54 scirne sciman sceadu forðeode . 55 wann
under wolcnum weop eal gesceaft 56 cwiðdon cyninges fyll
Crist wæs on rode 57 hwæðere þær fuse feorran cwoman 58 to
þam æðelinge ic þæt eall beheold. 59 Sare ic wæs mid sorgum gedrefed
hnag ic hwæðre þam secgu secgum to handa 60 eaðmod elne mycle
genamon hie þær ælmihtigne God 61 ahofon hine of ðam
hefian wite forleton me þa hilderincas 62 standan steame
bedrifenne eall ic wæs mid strælum forwundod 63 aledon hie
ðær limwerigne gestodon him æt his lices heafdu heafdum 64 beheoldon hie
ðær heofenes dryhten and he hine ðær hwile reste 65 meðe æfter
ðam miclan gewinne. Ongunnon him þa mold[[æ]]|e|rn wyrcan
66 beornas on banan gesyhðe curfon hie ðæt of beorhtan stane
67 gesetton hie ðær on sigora wealdend ongunnon him þa
galan 68 earme on þa æfentide þa hie woldon eft siðian
69 meðe fram þam mæran þeodne reste he ðær mæte weorode
70 hwæðere we ðær reotende gode hwile . 71 stodon on staðole syððan
stefn up ge wat 72 hilderinca . hræw colode 73 fæger feorgbold þa us
man fyllan ongan . 74 ealle to eorðan þæt wæs egeslic wyrd
75 bedealf us man on deopan seaþe hwæðre me þær dryhtnes
þegnas 76 freondas gefrunon 77 ond gyredon me golde and seolfre.
78 Nu ðu miht gehyran hæleð min se leofa 79 þæt ic bealuwara
weorc gebiden hæbbe 80 sarra sorga is nu sæl cumen 81 þæt me
weorðiað wide and side 82 menn ofer moldan and eall þeos mære
gesceaft . 83 gebiddaþ him toþyssum beacne on me bearn Godes
84 þrowode hwile forþan ic þrymfæst nu. 85 hlifige under
heofenu heofenum. and ic hælan mæg . 86 æghwylcne anra þara þe him bið
egesa to me 87 iu icwæs geworden wita heardost . 88 leodum
ærþan ic him lifes weg 89 rihtne gerymde
90 hwæt me þa geweorðode wuldres ealdor 91
ofer ofer
heofon rices weard, 92 swylce swa he his modor eac
marian sylfe 93 ælmihtig God . for ealle menn 94 geweorðode
ofer eall wifa cynn. 95 Nu ic þe hate hæleð.min se leofa.
96 þæt ðu þas gesyhðe secge mannu mannum 97 onwreoh wordu wordum þæt hit is
wuldres beam 98 se ðe ælmihtig God on þrowode. 99
for for
manegu manegum synnu synnum . 100 and Adames ealdgewyrhtum 101 deað he
þær byrigde hwæðere eft dryhten aras 102 mid his miclan
mihte mannu mannum to helpe 103 he ða on heofenas astag . hider
eft fundaþ 104 on þy middangeard mancynn secan 105 on
domdæge dryhten sylfa 106 ælmihtig God and his englas mid . 107 þæt he
þonne wile deman se ah domes geweald 108 anra gehwylcum swa he
him ærur her 109 on þyssum lænum life geearnaþ . 110 ne mæg þær
ænig unforht wesan . 111 for þam worde . þe se wealdend cwyð. 112
he for þære mænige hwær se man sie 113 se ðe for
naman deaðes  wo \l// de 114 biteres onbyrigan swa he ær on
ðam beame dyde . 115 ac hie þonne forhtiað .and fea þencaþ 116 hwæt hie to
Criste cweðan onginnen . 117 Ne þearf ðær þonne ænig unforht
wesan 118 þe him ær in breostum bereð beacna selest . 119 Ac ðurh
ða rode sceal rice gesecan 120 of eorðwege æghwylc sawl 121 seo þe
mid wealdende wunian þenceð 122 gebæd ic me þa to þan beame
bliðemode 123 elne mycle þær ic ana wæs 124 mæte werede wæs
modsefa 125 afysed on forðwege feala ealra gebad 126
is me nu lifes hyht 127 þæt  \ic//  þone sigebeam secan mote
128 ana oftor þonne ealle men 129 well weorþian me is willa to ðam
130 mycel on mode and min mund byrd is 131 geriht to þære rode .
Nah ic ricra feala 132 freonda on foldan[[on]] ac hie forð heonon
133 gewiton of worulde dreamum sohton him wuldres cyning
134 lifiaþ nu on heofenum mid heahfædere 135 wuniaþ on wuldre and ic wene
me 136 daga gehwylce hwænne me dryhtnes rod 137 þe ic her
on on
ær sceawode 138 on þysson lænan life gefetige 139 and me þon þonne gebring
þær is blis mycel 140 dream on heofonu heofonum þær is dryhtnes folc 141
to symle þær is singal blis 142 he þon þonne asette þær ic
syþþan mot 143 wunian on wuldre well mid þam halgu halgum 144 dreames
brucan si me dryhten freond 145 se ðe heer on eorþan ær þrowode
146 onþam gealgtreowe for guman synnu synnum 147 he us onlysde and us lif
forgeaf 148 heofonlicne ham hiht wæs geniwad 149 mid bledu bledum and mid blisse
þa þe þær bryne þolodan. 150 se Sunu wæs sigorfæst on þa
151 mihtig and spedig þa he mid manigeo com 152 gasta weorode
[[o]]on Godes rice 153 anwealda ælmihtig englu englum to blisse. 154 and eallum
ðam halgu halgum þam þe on heofonum ær 155 wunedon on wuldre þa heora
wealdend cwom 156 ælmihtig God þær his eðel wæs .

pages.text: M with an animal head in the middle. A large zoomorphic capital resembling the opening capital of XXI. MENða leofestan , us gedafenaþ ærest
þæt we gemunen and gereccen be Gode
ælmihtigu ælmihtigum , þe geworhte heofonas and eorðan
and ealle gesceacontinuation of Mfta , þone we sculon gelyfan þrynlic \n// e on hadum .
and anlicne on s continuation of M spede :   oðer o \ is//  soðlice se hd ælmihtiges fæder ,
oðer is cointinuation of M ælmihtiges haliges gastes ,
and continuation of M þeahhwæðere we sceolon andettan anne  God  on
. and on mihte . and on godcunnesse , , for þam se fæder ys
ece  God  , and se haliga gast ys ys ece  God  . Ealle
þry , se fæder . and se sunu . and se haliga gast , wæron æfre efenece
and æfre beoð , and hie þry an God syndon . Fram þam , þurh þæne .
and on þam syndon geworhte ealle þa þinc þe gesewene syndon .
and ealle þa þe ungesewene syndon , þa ne mæg nan eorþlic man
ealle asecgan .   Ærest , on frymþe he geworhte heofonas  and
eorðan . and sæ and ealle þa þinc þe on him syndon , and ealle þa englas
þe on heofenum syndon . And ealle þa ðe of englum to deoflum
wurdon , ealle he hie of him sylfum mid his oroðe
ut ableow and þone þe he foremærostne hæfde ofer ealle þa
oðre englas þe  Lucifer  wæs haten , þæt ys on ure geþeode
gereht , ac he eft , þa he hine sylfne his scyppende
don wolde and him  þrym setl þrymsetl  on norðdæle heofona rices
getimbrian wolde , of ðam he ricene afeoll . And ealle þa ðe æt
ðam ræde mid hi him wæron and him æfter besawon , ealle hie wurdon
of englum to deoflum forsceapene and on helle bescofene , þær
hie on ecnesse witu þoliað , for ðam þe hie forhogedon hira
scyppend , ælmihtigne  God  . Syððan he geworhte of eorðan
lame þone ærestan m an þe æfre wæs , þone he be naman
naman nemde naman Adam
nemde , and him on bebelow liflicne gast . And him ealle eorðan
gesceafta on geweald sealde and sæs fixas ,  þæt hie him
sceoldon . And he him eallum naman gesceop , ægðer ge
nytenum ge fugelum . ge fixum , and hie ealle gyt be ðam naman
fram eallu eallum mannu mannum synt genemnede ðe him  Adam  æt
frymðe gesceop . and dryhten ælmihtig of  Adames  winstran
sidan genam þæt ribb þe he þæt wif of geworhte þe
Eua  hatte . Of ðam twam þurh  Godes  mihte is ealles
middangeardes folc framcumen . And him  God  forgeaf
þæt hie ealles geweald agan moston þe on eorðan wære ,
butan anes treowes bleda þe is genemned lifes treow , treow, and we hit nemnað fictreow. Þæt
treow ys on middan neorxnawange. Be ðam treowe
Crist  sylf forewarnode ægðer ge  Adam  ge  Euan  , and him
sæde bam þæt swa hwylcum dæge swa hie ðæs treowes
bleda æton , hie sceoldon forweorðan. And hie eac swa
dydon . Ac ða se deofol geseah and wiste þæt him  God  swa
mycel forgifen hæfde , and he sylf beswicen þæs . þa þe
mid him of heofonum gefeollon , þa ðohte he to
hie , eall swa he sylf beswicen wæs . Gehweorrfde
hine sylfne þa on anre nædran hiwe , and hie butu beswac
and forlærde . Sæde him .  þæt swa hwylcum dæge swa hie þæs
treowes bleda æton , þæt hie wæron syððan þam gelice
þe hie gworhte . Ac hit him wearð biterlice forgolden
on hyra life . ge eac æfter , ægðer ge him . ge eallu eallum
þe him fram cwom , oð ures dryhtnes tocyme.
Nigon hund wrintra . and þritig wintra  Adam  lifde on þysse
worulde on geswince and on yrmþe , and syððan to helle
for , and þær grimme witu þolode fif þusend wintra  and
⁊ eahta and twa hund wintra and
eahta  and .xx. wintra .   Men þa leofestan , us is nu for þy
mycel nydþearf , nu we þus þurh  Godes  mihte ealle
syndon , þæt we gecyrren of yfele to Gode ,
⁊ and
mid eallu eallum eaðmettum godcunde lara . and þam georne
fylgen , and us æt  Gode  . and æt eallum his halgu halgum mihta bydden , , þy
læs us deoflo æfter urum forðsiðe ongean wurpon .
þæt we oft ætgædere ealle wæron , and usbeforan halige
lara gehyrdon  rædan, and we na ðe beteran næron ac þe
mættran .   Ac utan us wendan , men þa leofestan , to beterum
þingum , and forlætan eallo yfolo þing , and don gd swa forð
swa we fyrmest magon , and to  Gode  and to eallu eallum his halegum þæs
georne earnian. Us ys georne to witenne . and to gehlystenne
for hwylcu hwylcum þingu þingum we ðas gangdagas healdað and barefote gað
þus on geares fyrste þas þry dagas. Se feorða is dryhtne
sylfum for his mæran upstige of eorðan to heofonum
gehalgod. And mid hwylcum þingum we hie healdan sceolon ,
us is georne to witanne . We hie sceolon healdan
on on
eadmodnysse . and on myclu myclum geþylde . and on soðre lufe . and on eallre
clænnesse . lichoman and sawle . and on godum wæccum and on nytwyrðum . and on
fæstenum . and on halgum . and on ælmesdædum . and on eallre godnesse .  and
on lufe  Godes  and manna .   Manegum haligum mannu mannum þas
syndon wiðmetene , ac us is lang  þæt eall to gereccanne .
Utan þeah us georne wið deofol scyldan eallu eallum tidum and us ongean
his yfelan lara  Godes  mildheortnesse biddan . dæges and nihtes . Se
deofol dæges and nihtes winnð ongean usmid his geleafleste ; uton
we winnan ongean hine mid geleaffulnesse . He winnð mid
; uton we ongean mid eaðmodnesse. He us gegearwað
; uton we ongean clænnesse . He gegripð mnfulnesse ; uton
we ongean rihtwisnesse . He us onbebringeð yrsunge ; uton
we fylgean geþylde . He us on asent gytsunge ; uton we began
mild heor[[d]]tnesse . He us myngað to gifernesse ; uton þær
gehealdan forhæfednesse . And æfre ongean his yfelan willan .
uton wyrcan  Godes  willan . eall we sceolon efestan to  Godes
templum swa swiðe swa ða bion doð to hira hyfe , to þam þæt
we magon getreowlice onbyrgean þa swetnesse þæs gastlican
huniges of ðam godcundum rædingu rædingum .   We gelyfað , men þa leofestan ,

samod siðiað. Eala þæt ic wæs þæs heardestan geþohtes mann
and þæs forcuðestan , þæt ic me mine dagas to nytte ne gedyde.
þa hwyle þe ic on worulde wæs ! Ic ða þe ic hira willan worhte ,
hie willað me nu gesceððan. hie sendað hira handa on me,
þæt hie me mid sare ut ateon. and to frecnessu frecnessum utgelæden.
Nænig minu minum yflum me gefultumað , þa ic sylfa ær ne wolde ,
ac eallum ic eom læðed. and ealle hie me mid searwe and mid inwidde
onlociaþ. Wa la, cweð sio synfulle sawl , hwam sceal ic gelyfan
æfter me, oððe æt hwam sceal ic getreowða habban þa ic
mine forleas. Nænig min þæra nehstena getreowne geleafan
hafaþ. eawla, se geleafa is geworden and he is numen. and he næs
naworn gesund.   Ongitaþ, mine þa leofestan bearn, cweð
ss sanctus  Isidorus  , and æghwylc cristen mann. smeage on him sylfum

syngedum wiðcwið , ne nænig þam manfullan wreceð. Þa
godan wædliaþ. on þysse worulde. and þa manfullan gehyhtaþ.
Þa manfullan wealdaþ nu on heora rice and hinað þa godan.
Ða unrihtan synt geweorðode nu. and þa oðfæstan aweorpene.
